overview: The hottest selling series in America! Dick-crazed girls do the darndest things. BARELY LEGAL #2 features five of the wildest legal teen sexploits ever captured on video. Watch Sweet Revenge and learn how Lillian and Staci turned a bitter love triangle into a red-hot threeway. In Ticket to Ride, two tight-bodied football cheerleaders show their team spirit when they tackle the older man. Curious tart Vanessa gives her boss a major raise in The Babysitter. You've read the magazine. Now let the girls of BARELY LEGAL release your fountain of youth.
tagline: The hottest setting series in America!
title: Barely Legal 2
